document.full_text: thousands of viewers who have been watching a live video stream of two hawks incubating eggs in a nest on a manhattan high-rise were likely to receive a pay-off on tuesday, when the eggs appeared to be hatching.
document.title: hawk fans await birth via webcam trained on new york nest
lines_and_colors: thousands of viewers who have been watching a live video stream of two hawks incubating eggs in a nest on a manhattan high-rise were likely to receive a pay-off on tuesday, when the eggs appeared to be hatching.
